text: Metomidate is a non-barbiturate imidazole that was discovered by Janssen Pharmaceutica in 1965BE Patent 662474 and under the names (Hypnodil, Nokemyl) is sold as a sedative-hypnotic drug used in Europe to treat humans and for veterinary purposes. 11C-labelled metomidate (11C-metomidate), may be used with positron emission tomography (PET). For instance, to detect tumors of adrenocortical origin. == See also == * Etomidate * Propoxate == References == Category:11β-Hydroxylase inhibitors Category:Sedatives Category:Hypnotics Category:General anesthetics Category:Ethyl esters Category:Imidazoles Category:GABAA receptor positive allosteric modulators
title: Metomidate
